Identity.History: "For their drink, they draw a liquor from barley or other grain; and ferment the same, so as to make it resemble wine."\nTacitus, De Origine et situ Germanorum, 98 CE.
Identity.Tooltip: The Germanics mostly grew a number of grain species, complementing the harvest with wild fruits and vegetables.\nHarvest grain for food. Max gatherers: 5.
